participant_1.background:
I met the most interesting people while filming my documentary.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike.
My day starts with a quick ride down the boardwalk on my skateboard
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.
I loved playing in the rain with my friends, even though we would get soaked.

participant_2.background:
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.
My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank.
i love to eat meat.
I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.

content.text: Hi there, I just had so much fun filming my documentary.
That's so cool! What's it about?
It's about the history of my city.
Oh, cool! I like learning about history.
Me too! I think it's so important to know where we came from.
Totally! It helps us understand the present and make better decisions about the future.
I agree! I'm really passionate about it.
Me too! I think it's important to be an informed citizen.
I agree! I think it's really important to make our voices heard.
Me too! I think we need to make a difference in the world.
I agree! I think we can make a difference if we all work together.
Me too! I think we can accomplish great things if we work together.
